## About This Book

"Turtle DSA" was born out of a desire to create a practical, hands-on resource for learning DSA. Unlike traditional textbooks that focus heavily on theory, this book emphasizes problem-solving patterns and techniques that are directly applicable to coding interviews and real-world software development.

### Philosophy

The core philosophy of this book is **"Learn by Doing"**. We believe that the best way to understand complex algorithms is to implement them and use them to solve problems.
